content:
Make a list of 5 sentence starters that use the given conjunction.
Conjunction: Even though

Certainly! Here are five sentence starters using the conjunction "Even though":

1. Even though the weather was terrible, ...
2. Even though she had studied all night, ...
3. Even though the odds were against him, ...
4. Even though the team was exhausted, ...
5. Even though it seemed impossible at first, ...
